name: 円香
text: 交通機関の乱れが予想されるため

name: 小糸
text:
『交通機関の乱れが予想されるため
本日の打ち合わせには遅れる見込みです』
trans:
『We expect traffic disruptions, that will result in
us being late for today's meeting』

name: 透
text:
いいね
社会人。小糸ちゃん

name: 小糸
text: 『ご了承ください』……こ、これでいいかな？
trans:
『Thank you for your understanding.』......W-Will
that be okay?

name: 雛菜
text:
じゃあ何する～？
暇じゃない～？
trans:
Then what should we do~?
Are we free yet~?

name: 円香
text:
まだだって言ってるでしょ
すぐに来いってことになるかもしれない
trans:
Not yet. We might get asked to go over quickly for
all we know.

name: 雛菜
text:
へ～？
こんな雨なのに～？
trans:
Hee~?
Even though it's raining so heavily?

name: 小糸
text:
そ、それか
迎えに来てくれるかも……？
trans:
O-Or maybe,
he'll come pick us up~?

name: 雛菜
text:
じゃあ迎えに来てくれるまでは
何する～？
trans:
Then what should we do while we wait for him to
come?

name: 透
text:
ダメ？　打ち合わせ
学校じゃ
trans:
Can't we? Have the meeting.
In school.

name: 透
text:
やばいの？
保護者じゃん
trans:
No good?
Isn't he our guardian?

name: 小糸
text:
あ……！
プロデューサーさんから返事……！

name: 小糸
text:
……今日は外部の人がいない打ち合わせだから、
遅れても大丈夫だよって
trans:
...He says that it's okay to be late since the meeting
today only involves people from our agency.

name: 小糸
text: 雨が弱まってからゆっくりおいで……だって……！
trans:
We can wait, then take our time going to the office
once the rain gets lighter.

name: 円香
trans: Doesn't look like it'll get any lighter, though.

name: 透
text: ゆっくり行けるんだし
trans: We can take our time anyway.

name: 雛菜
trans: Hey, so what do we do now~?

name: 円香
trans: Is there anything we can do, actually?

name: 小糸
text:
お、お菓子あるよ……！
食べる……？
trans:
I-I brought some sweets...!
Want some...?

name: 円香
text: ……っていうか、うちの吹部ってさ
trans: ...Hey, you know our school's brass band?

name: 円香
text: いつになったら上手くなるの
trans: When will they get better at it, you think.

name: 円香
text: 下手だし、いつも同じところしか練習してない
trans:
Not only that, but they only practice the same stuff
all the time.

name: 雛菜
text: そういう曲なんじゃない～？
trans: Don't they all play songs like that~?

name: 円香
trans: ...You really think they're all the same?

name: 雛菜
text:
あは～
知らないけど～

name: 円香
trans: Then why don't you join them?

name: 雛菜
text:
雛菜はいいや～
小糸ちゃん、お菓子は～？
trans:
Hinana'll pass~
Koito-chan, can I have some sweets~?

name: 小糸
text:
そ、そういえば練習したよね
小学生の時
trans:
A-Ah, we did practice playing back when we were in
elementary school.

name: 小糸
text:
リコーダー
透ちゃんの家に集まって……！

name: 小糸
text:
や、やったよ……！
毎日集まって上手くなろうって……
trans:
We did...!
We gathered everyday practicing to get better...

name: 円香
trans: It happened over a few days in a row, remember?

name: 小糸
text:
わ、忘れちゃったけど……
あんまり続かなかったかな……
trans:
E-Even I forgot how to play it...
Guess we didn't continue practicing...

name: 円香
text: このメンツで何か続いた試しがない
trans: Our lot never continued doing anything that lasted.

name: 円香
text: リコーダーも、勉強会も、交換日記も
trans: The recorder, study sessions, diary exchange.

name: 小糸
text:
…………じゃ、じゃあ
アイドルは……？

name: 小糸
text:
つ、続けたいな
……アイドルは……
trans:
I-I want to continue
...being an idol...

name: 円香
text: ちょっと雨雲予想見て、小糸
trans: Can you check the weather report, Koito?
